definition: erhua variant of 挨個|挨个[ai1 ge4]
to suffer/to endure/to pull through (hard times)/to delay/to stall/to play for time/to dawdle
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

sentences.english: He looked from one to the other of them. "I think that you already know this."
sentences.chinese: 他挨個兒地看着他們，“我以爲你們已經知道了。

sentences.english: We were all sat around the pool, waiting for our time to go to see the manager.
sentences.chinese: 我們圍着游泳池坐了一圈，挨個兒等着和教練見面。

sentences.english: The pupils took turns in reading out their work.
sentences.chinese: 學生們挨個兒朗讀他們的作業。

sentences.english: In the middle there stood twelve cradles next to each other.
sentences.chinese: 在洞的正中央有十二個搖藍挨個兒排放着。
